太白飴: (たいはくあめ) - white rice jelly
太皇太后: (たいこうたいごう) - Grand Empress Dowager
太監: (たいかん) - Grand Eunuch (former Chinese government title); eunuch
太目: (ふとめ) - (ant: 細め) plump; somewhat large
太神楽: (ダイカグラ) - grand kagura performance at Ise; type of performance including the lion dance and juggling; Camellia japonica 'Daikagura' (cultivar of Japanese camellia)
太笛: (ふとぶえ) - kagura flute (six-holed horizontal flute)
太箸: (ふとばし) - festive chopsticks; thick round chopsticks used on festive occasions
太簇: (たいぞく) - (in China) 3rd note of the ancient chromatic scale (approx. E); first lunar month
太糸: (ふといと) - low count yarn; thick thread
太線: (ふとせん) - heavy line (for emphasis); thick line; underline; border
太腿を出す: (ふとももをだす) - to expose one's thighs; to bare one's buttocks
太虚: (たいきょ) - the sky/the universe; taixu (the great vacuity, in Chinese philosophy, the primordial substance that gives rise to qi)
太郎さん: (たろうさん) - cockroach (word used in restaurants so customers won't catch on); Mr Tarou
太閤: (たいこう) - (esp. refers to Toyotomi Hideyoshi)  taiko; title for a regent, later for the grand chancellor, also for the father of an Imperial adviser (advisor) who passed the role to his son
太閤検地: (たいこうけんち) - Toyotomi Hideyoshi's nationwide land survey (1582 CE)
太陰太陽暦: (たいいんたいようれき) - lunisolar calendar
太陰崇拝: (たいいんすうはい) - (yoji) moon worship
太陰暦: (たいいんれき) - (sometimes also refers to a lunisolar calendar)  lunar calendar
太陰潮: (たいいんちょう) - lunar tide (tides caused by the moon)
太陽エネルギー: (たいようエネルギー) - solar energy; solar power
太陽光パネル: (たいようこうパネル) - solar panel
太陽光圧: (たいようこうあつ) - light pressure (from the sun)
太陽光発電: (たいようこうはつでん) - solar power (generation)
太陽光線: (たいようこうせん) - sunlight; rays of the sun
太陽及び地球: (たいようおよびちきゅう) - the sun and the earth
太陽放射: (たいようほうしゃ) - solar radiation
太陽族: (たいようぞく) - (from Ishihara Shintarou's 1955 novel 「太陽の季節」 (Season of the Sun)) dissolute postwar youths
太陽望遠鏡: (たいようぼうえんきょう) - solar telescope; helioscope
太陽柱: (たいようちゅう) - sun pillar; solar pillar
太陽歯車: (たいようはぐるま) - sun gear; sun wheel
太陽潮: (たいようちょう) - solar tide (tides caused by the Sun)
太陽熱温水器: (たいようねつおんすいき) - solar water-heater
太陽熱発電: (たいようねつはつでん) - solar power generation
太陽神経叢: (たいようしんけいそう) - solar plexus
太陽系外惑星: (たいようけいがいわくせい) - extrasolar planet
太陽蝶: (タイヨウチョウ) - sunset morpho (butterfly, Morpho hecuba)
太陽質量: (たいようしつりょう) - {astron} solar mass
太陽輻射: (たいようふくしゃ) - solar radiation
太陽電池パネル: (たいようでんちパネル) - solar panel
太陽電波: (たいようでんぱ) - solar radio waves
太陽面通過: (たいようめんつうか) - transit (of a planet) over the sun
太陽鳥: (タイヨウチョウ) - sunbird (any bird in the family Nectariniidae)
太食調: (たいじきちょう) - (in gagaku) scale similar to Mixolydian mode on E
太魛: (タチウオ) - largehead hairtail (Trichiurus lepturus); scabbard fish; beltfish
太麺: (ふとめん) - thick noodles; thick pasta
太鼓内訳: (たいこうちわけ) - {sumo} drumming style used to announce bouts
太鼓判: (たいこばん) - large seal/large stamp; seal of approval/guarantee/endorsement
太鼓判を押す: (たいこばんをおす) - to give the stamp of approval
太鼓台: (たいこだい) - very large float used to carry taiko at festivals
太鼓打: (タイコウチ) - Laccotrephes japonensis (species of water scorpion)
太鼓持ち: (たいこもち) - professional jester/professional entertainer/comedian/buffoon; flatterer/sycophant/brown-noser
太鼓焼: (たいこやき) - Japanese muffin containing bean jam, served hot
太鼓焼き: (たいこやき) - Japanese muffin containing bean jam, served hot
太鼓虫: (たいこむし) - (sometimes written 水蠆) dragonfly naiad (nymph)
夫の命: (つまのみこと) - you (referring to one's spouse or partner); dear
夫を立てる: (おっとをたてる) - to treat one's husband with due respect
夫人: (はしかし) - (ふじん, はしかし only)  wife/Mrs/madam; (ふじん only)  wife of a nobleman (aristocrat, etc.); (ふじん, ぶにん only)  consort of the emperor
夫唱婦随: (ふしょうふずい) - (yoji) a wife should do her husband's bidding
夫婦: (fuufu) - casal de casados, marido e mulher; dele e dela
夫婦きどり: (めおときどり) - behaving (posing) as if they were a married couple
夫婦の和: (ふうふのわ) - conjugal harmony; concord between husband and wife
夫婦の所有財産: (ふうふのしょゆうざいさん) - conjugal property; joint ownership property of husband and wife
